oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Forsøgsbeskrivelse af specialforsøg BAROF WP2 2005
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hansen, Preben Klarskov
Kristensen, Kristian
Rasmussen, Ilse A.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop health, quality, protection
Weed management
Breeding, genetics and propagation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This document describes the design and layout of the field trial WP2 in 2005 at Research Centre Flakkebjerg. The experiment contains 4 pure genotypes and 2 or 3 component mixtures of these genoypes. Further the experiment contains 2 levels of pesticide treatment (with/without), 2 levels of mechanical weed control (with/without) and 2 levels of pig slurry application rates (40 and 80% of recommended need.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Hansen, Preben Klarskov; Kristensen, Kristian and Rasmussen, Ilse A. (2005) Forsøgsbeskrivelse af specialforsøg BAROF WP2 2005. [Description of the specieal field experiment BAROF WP2 2005.] Danish Institute of Agricultural Sciences, Department of Integrated Pest Management.
